title: Who inspires you what did they do to inspire you? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have to say that I'm mpat proud of myself as I managed to gain weight and top the scale at nearly 400 pounds… One day back in 2008, I decided it was time to see what was under all those layer, started eating healthy foods and moving more and lost over 200 pounds with no diet aids, surgeries or gyms. Made up my own menu of healthy foods and walked the country roads. Gained about 40lbs back, which I'm proud to say I've recently dropped 25 of it. Now I've created a FaceBook group where myself and others encourage one another to eat healthy and keep on track with walking as well as share recipes and photos of our progress!!! Yay Me.

I can say I am Most proud of my My Daughters. Although they are just as strong as I am, they lost their mother just as I lost them. They already had no father and they are still smiling beautiful little ladies. And my 2 year old, bless her for being ripped outta her mothers arms for almost a year illegally. May she never remember the things that I did. May she one day be told the truth as well! My forever angels!
